attributes.action: Close The Facebook Page "Dead Baby Jokes" Its Extremely Insensitive To People Who Have Lost A Baby!!!
attributes.additional_details: We Need To Close This Group As Its Disrespectful to those who have lost an innocent baby, these people are not only sick and twisted they obviously do not think about people's feeling's and the hurt and pain they're going through already each and everyday let alone reading these comments! Help us make this group deleted and the people writing the disgusting comments prosecuted!!!!
